 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַם‎</span>] **verb** ==avenge, take vengeance== ( <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎להנקם נקמי אויב‎</span> (Niph\`al + accusative of congnate meaning with verb); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקם‎</span>, noun also [[Eccl.12.6|Eccl 12:6]] (compare [[Deut.32.41|Deut 32:41]]), [[Eccl.39.30|Eccl 39:30]]; [[Eccl.48.7|Eccl 48:7]] Late Hebrew <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקַם‎</span> especially in derivatives; Aramaic <span class="bdbLangAramaic">‎נְקַם‎</span> (rare), <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> in derived species; Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***take vengeance*** (<img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***upon***), [[BDB#Lane|Lane]]<sup>3037</sup>; compare Ethiopic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> [[BDB#Di|Di]]<sup>458</sup> ***vindictae studium, ultionis cupido***; Assyrian <abbr title="transliteration"><u>***i‡‡imu***</u></abbr>, ***vengeance***, ***requital***, is possibly from √ <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אקם‎</span> Jäger<sup>BAS ii. 279</sup>); — 

**Qal** ***Perfect*** 3 masculine singular suffix <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקָמֵ֫נִי‎</span> [[1Sam.24.13|1Sam 24:13]] ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקּוֺם‎</span> [[Deut.32.43|Deut 32:43]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקֹּם‎</span> [[Josh.10.13|Josh 10:13]] 2 masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּקֹּם‎</span> [[Lev.19.18|Lev 19:18]] ***Infinitive absolute*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקֹם‎</span> [[Exod.21.20|Exod 21:20]] construct <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקֹם‎</span> [[Ezek.24.8|Ezek 24:8]]; [[Ezek.25.12|Ezek 25:12]] ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקֹם‎</span> [[Num.31.2|Num 31:2]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקֵם‎</span> [[Nah.1.2|Nah 1:2]] + 3 t.; feminine <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נֹקֶ֫מֶת‎</span> [[Lev.26.25|Lev 26:25]] — 

**1.** ***avenge, take vengeance:*** 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** God subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דַּם עֲבָדָיו יִקּוֺם‎</span> [[Deut.32.43|Deut 32:43]] ***the blood of his servants he avengeth*** (against those who slew them) (+ [[1Kgs.2.5|1Kgs 2:5]] [[BDB#Sept|ᵐ5]]<sup>L</sup></lookup> [[BDB#Klo|Klo]]); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> absolute [[Nah.1.2|Nah 1:2]] (twice in verse) with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> (against Nineveh) [[Nah.1.2|Nah 1:2]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נָקָם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> (against Jerusalem) [[Ezek.24.8|Ezek 24:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עַלעֲֿלִילוֺהָם‎</span> ***on their doings*** (his people's) [[Ps.99.8|Ps 99:8]] <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקַם בְּרִית‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Lev.26.25|Lev 26:25]] ([[BDB#H|H]]) ***the vengeance of the covenant*** (against those who break it); <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נְקָמַנִי‎</span>[[1Sam.24.13|1Sam 24:13]], with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of person ***from*** whom vengeance is taken (compare [[Jer.20.10|Jer 20:10]]). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** ***Israel and its leaders against their enemies***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקמה‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> against whom [[Num.31.2|Num 31:2]] ([[BDB#P|P]]); with accusative <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִקֹּם אֹיְבָיו‎</span> [[Josh.10.13|Josh 10:13]] (poem). 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** Edom against Judah <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקם לְ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Ezek.25.12|Ezek 25:12]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **d.** in administration of justice against murder [[Exod.21.20|Exod 21:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). 

**2.** ***entertain revengeful feelings*** (opposed to <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אהב‎</span>) against neighbour forbidden [[Lev.19.18|Lev 19:18]] ([[BDB#H|H]]).

**Niph\`al** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקַּ֫מְתִּי‎</span> [[Judg.15.7|Judg 15:7]]; [[1Sam.14.24|1Sam 14:24]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְּמוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.25.12|Ezek 25:12]] ***imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָּקֵם‎</span> [[Exod.21.20|Exod 21:20]] 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אִנָָּֽקְמָה‎</span> [[Judg.16.28|Judg 16:28]]; [[Isa.1.24|Isa 1:24]] 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יִנָָּֽקְמוּ‎</span> [[Ezek.25.15|Ezek 25:15]] ***Infinitive*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנָּקֵם‎</span> [[Jer.46.10|Jer 46:10]] + 2 t.; ***Imperative*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנָּ֫קֶם‎</span> [[Jer.15.15|Jer 15:15]] plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הִנָָּֽקְמוּ‎</span> [[Jer.50.15|Jer 50:15]]: — 

**1.** ***avenge oneself***, 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **a.** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> of adversary [[Isa.1.24|Isa 1:24]]; [[Jer.46.10|Jer 46:10]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> advers., <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לְ‎</span> for whom [[Jer.15.15|Jer 15:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> adversary [[Jer.50.15|Jer 50:15]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **b.** of Israel and champions with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִן‎</span> [[Judg.16.28|Judg 16:28]]; [[1Sam.14.24|1Sam 14:24]]; [[Esth.8.13|Esth 8:13]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Judg.15.7|Judg 15:7]]; [[1Sam.18.25|1Sam 18:25]]. 
$\quad$ $\quad$ **c.** of enemies against Israel <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נקם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Ezek.25.15|Ezek 25:15]] with <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎בְּ‎</span> [[Ezek.25.12|Ezek 25:12]]. 

**2.** ***suffer vengeance*** (of law against murder) [[Exod.21.20|Exod 21:20]] ([[BDB#E|E]]). **Piel** ***Perfect*** 1 singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקַּ֫מְתִּי‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.7|2Kgs 9:7]]; [[Jer.51.36|Jer 51:36]] — ***avenge***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎דָּמִים מיד‎</span> [[2Kgs.9.7|2Kgs 9:7]] ***blood at hands of***; <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נִקְמָתֵךָ‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נ‎</span> [[Jer.51.36|Jer 51:36]] ***take vengeance for thee***.

**Hoph\`al** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֻקַּם‎</span> [[Gen.4.24|Gen 4:24]]; [[Exod.21.21|Exod 21:21]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎יֻקָּ֑ם‎</span> [[Gen.4.15|Gen 4:15]] ***be avenged, vengeance be taken*** (for blood).

**Hithpa\`el** ***Imperfect*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎תִּתְנַקֵּם‎</span> [[Jer.5.9|Jer 5:9]]; [[Jer.5.29|Jer 5:29]]; [[Jer.9.8|Jer 9:8]] ***Participle*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎מִתְנַקֵּם‎</span> [[Ps.8.3|Ps 8:3]]; [[Ps.44.17|Ps 44:17]] ***avenge oneself***, <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎י‎</span> subject <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לֹא תִתְנַקֵּם‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎׳‎</span><span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎נַפְשִׁי בְּ‎</span> [[Jer.5.9|Jer 5:9]]; [[Jer.5.29|Jer 5:29]]; [[Jer.9.8|Jer 9:8]] of Israel's enemies <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎אוֺיֵב‎</span> <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎וּמִתְנַקֵּם‎</span> [[Ps.8.3|Ps 8:3]]; [[Ps.44.17|Ps 44:17]].
